name: libidinally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to a person's sexual desire (= feeling of wanting something): She and her husband have always been libidinally incompatible (= have different levels of sexual desire). He wrote libidinally charged flights of fancy to an older, German music critic. Related words
libido
libidinal
More examplesFewer examplesThere would, Freud wrote, be hostility and intolerance shown towards those not libidinally bound together in the group.The affirming Dionysian woman can express her being and address the world through her libidinally charged “songs” in a full range of registers.
